name: THE BOOMER SLAYERS
description:
"In the age of political correctness, social justice, and feminism, the Doomer Slayers come to purge the world of filth and bring masculinity and brutality back to society. And the first to fall by the hands of the punishers will be The Gopnicks."

Use your BADASS character to clear your office of The Gopnicks with a mighty pistol and a hardcore shotgun. Eat NANO-DONUTS to restore your health and interact with stuff with your JUSTICE PUNCH. 

You can dash by tapping twice in the desired direction.

Leave your BOOMER COMMENT in Youtube trailer video to restore BADASSERY to the world.
